# MissionCanvas Action Brief

Date: 2026-02-18
Route: RIU-062 - Build & Implementation
Primary Agent: Theri (Build) with Rex (Architecture)

## Input
Objective: Create a planning system for an artisan manufacturing cooperative
Context: Teams are cross-cultural and communication is mostly asynchronous

Constraints: High accountability and public-facing transparency requirements

## Execution
One-Way Door: None detected
Next Artifact: Implementation Spec + Build Tasks
Immediate Action: Convert plan into build tickets and delivery sequence.

- Verify reversibility before execution
